It covers the most southern areas of the country and is also the second largest one. == History == === Pakistani rule === In 1947 the area was continued as a Division, as one of four divisions of East Bengal. The upland districts of Khagrachhari, Rangamati and Bandarban together comprise an area known as the Chittagong Hill Tracts. Before 1995, the four districts of Sylhet Division were also a part of Chittagong Division. == Overview == Area 33,771 km² Main City Chittagong Population 23,999,345 Literacy rate 32.08% Category:Divisions of British India
